climbs.name: Unnecessary Roughness
climbs.fa: Kevin Keith, Bill Garrett and Wayne Augusto

content.description: Climb slab on left side of a small wall up to grooves and sparse protection. Continue onto steeper face climbing past two bolts to gain a vertical hand and fist crack which leads to a large ledge and bolted anchor.Â
content.protection: Gear to #4 Camalots and two bolts
content.location: This route starts on a smaller wall with large manzanitas at its base

climbs.name: Mexican Radio
climbs.fa: Alex Tufiel, Kevin Keith and Bill Cramer

content.description: Climb an entry slab and cross the furrow at the base of the cliff. Continue on the right side of the cliff up to steeper face climbing past 5 bolts to a large ledge and a chain anchor.
content.protection: 5 quick draws and something for the bolted anchor
content.location: Just left of an OW crack on the right side of the small cliff above a large manzanita grove.

climbs.name: Chip off the Ol' Block
climbs.fa: Kevin Keith, Bill Garrett, Wayne Augusto and Bill Cramer

content.description: Climb a quartz laden slab up to steeper face climbing past 5 bolts to a right facing flake. A #3 Cam a lot fits nicely here. Continue up to a large ledge with a bolted anchor.
content.protection: 5 draws, a #3 cam a lot and something for the bolted anchor.
content.location: In the center of a small wall with large manzanitas at its base. This route is just left of a deep furrow at the base of the cliff.

content.description: This is the formation just east of the Tall Wall. This crag hosts several mixed routes up to 5.10.
